sense.name: decide a specific time for an event
sense.examples: I've scheduled a concert for next week. I scheduled an exam for this afternoon. The Air Resources Board has scheduled a public workshop to discuss the status of Zero Emission Bus technology.

sense.name: obtain resources for a planned event
sense.examples: We made a powerpoint presentation and scheduled a room to have the forum. If you have scheduled a bus with the MCA, you must cancel it 48 hours in advance. I have scheduled a projector/laptop to use United Streaming next week with my students.
